headline: Air Products to Showcase Industrial Decarbonization Solutions at POWERGEN International in Dallas, Texas
summary: Air Products (NYSE:APD) will highlight how its industrial gases, such as hydrogen, can help the power industry generate a cleaner future and reach its decarbonization goals at POWERGEN International, from February 11-13, at the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center in Dallas, Texas.
